vibhajjavāda： vibhajjavāda（ti）
ဝိဘဇ္ဇဝါဒ（တိ）
«vibhajja1+vada+ṇa．（pu）vibhajyavāda-saṃ．vibhajjavāya-prā，addhamāgadhī．»
[ဝိဘဇ္ဇ၁+ဝဒ+ဏ။（ပု）ဝိဘဇျဝါဒ-သံ။ဝိဘဇ္ဇဝါယ-ပြာ၊အဒ္ဓမာဂဓီ။]
Vibhajjavāda：The name given to the Dhamma by the orthodox； the   term is identical with Theravāda and the Buddha is described as Vibhajjavādī．  E．g．Mhv．v．171； VibhA．130； cp．Kvu．Trs．introd．p．38．

vibhajjavāda：ဝိဘဇ္ဇဝါဒ（တိ）
[ဝိဘဇ္ဇ၁+ဝဒ+ဏ။（ပု）ဝိဘဇျဝါဒ-သံ။ဝိဘဇ္ဇဝါယ-ပြာ၊အဒ္ဓမာဂဓီ။]
ခွဲခြမ်း-ဝေဘန်-၍-ပြော-ဆို-တတ်သော၊သူ။
